name: OT Payment Report
query:
SELECT
  view_ot_hour.employee as employee_id,
  view_ot_hour.employee_name,
  view_ot_hour.working_hours,
  view_ot_hour.status,
  view_ot_hour.department,
  view_ot_hour.shift,
  view_ot_hour.attendance_date,
  view_ot_hour.base as gross,
 view_ot_hour.ot_time,
HOUR(ot_time) AS ot_hour,
  minute(ot_time) AS ot_minute,

if ( minute(ot_time)>=45,1,0) AS minute_to_hour,
 ( HOUR(ot_time)  + if( minute(ot_time)>=45,1,0)) AS total_ot_hour,

ROUND(((BASE-1800)/1.5)/104,2) AS ot_rate,
   
round((HOUR(ot_time) + (if( minute(ot_time)>=45,1,0)))*round(((BASE-1800)/1.5)/104,2),0) as ot_amount
FROM `view_ot_hour`
where 
 (view_ot_hour.attendance_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s) and  view_ot_hour.employee= %(employee_id)s
